subject: Re: Box alternatives.
author: psi_research
full_text:
There is a phenomena known as stochastic resonance that states a weak
signal can "piggy back" on a stronger carrier signal and then detected
by us. In other words, we can hear audible noise and our brains and
devices can detect and record the embedded messages that would
otherwise be undetectable.  -Bill
